description: Steer Technologies Inc. operates an integrated ESG technology platform that offers subscription and on-demand services. The company provides STEER EV, a subscription-based offering led by its flagship electric vehicle subscription business; and on-demand services incorporating delivery, B2B marketplace, Delivery-as-a-Service, and rideshare businesses. The company was formerly known as Facedrive Inc. and changed its name to Steer Technologies Inc. in October 2022. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Scarborough, Canada.
